name: Underworld Memories
description:
In Underworld Memories you control a mysterious character with no memory in a dungeon. Each room is unique and full of surprises. Defeat your enemies, get stronger and stronger and go down to the next room.
Underworld Memories is an Action Roguelike with changeable maps.
Story
With no memory of your past, your only option is to stay alive in search of answers. Advance through the dungeon and begin to understand the real reason for being there. Fragments of your past will be released, so be prepared!

Main features

  • Permanent death. You will die! And you will need to go back to the beginning, losing all your coins and dignity in the process.
  • Random rooms. Each room is unique and generated in a procedural way. So, enjoy each round. The next room only becomes available after defeating all enemies in the current one.
  • Vertical dungeon. All rooms are exactly below the previous one and all you want to do is reach the bottom and end your suffering.
  • Skills. When you defeat a boss, you get a boss soul, that soul can be exchanged for a skill. Skills are kept even after death.
  • Combat. Inside small rooms full of bizarre creatures you will experience frantic combat and a shower of bullets.
  • Portals. Use portals wisely to teleport to rooms you've already explored.
